snippet: At a hearing, proponents of government tariffs on solar panels imported from China said that such measures were vital to saving American manufacturers from unfair competition. Foes said they would protect companies that made poor business choices.
abstract: At a hearing, proponents of government tariffs on solar panels imported from China said that such measures were vital to saving American manufacturers from unfair competition. Foes said they would protect companies that made poor business choices.

headline.main: A Tug of War Over Solar Tariffs
